Package org.miktim.websocket

WebSocket Java SE 1.6+, Android 4+ server and client package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WsConnection.Handler
    WebSocket connection event handler.
    WsConnection.OnRequest
    The interface allows adding user-defined HTTP headers.
    WsServer.Handler
    WebSocket server events handler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WebSocket
    WebSocket client connections and WebSocket servers factory.
    WsConnection
    WebSocket client-side or server-side connection.
    WsMessage
    WebSocket message.
    WsParameters
    WebSocket connection parameters.
    WsServer
    WebSocket server for insecure or TLS connections.
    WsStatus
    WebSocket status.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WsException
    Unchecked exception "hides" real checked cause.

Package org.miktim.websocket Description

WebSocket Java SE 1.6+, Android 4+ server and client package.

Release notes:
- Java SE 1.6+, Android 4+ compatible;
- meets the requirements of the RFC6455 ;
- supported WebSocket version: 13;
- WebSocket extensions (Per-Message Deflate, ...) not supported;
- supports insecure or TLS connections;
- client connections support IDNs (Internationalized Domain Names);
- stream-based messaging.



Version: 5.0

License: MIT (c) 2025 @miktim
